Topic.Title: Library links on the help documentation are broken

Posts.EditableText: I tried following the wearables and pathing libraries located here: http://docs.textadventures.co.uk/quest/guides/ Got a message that they were moved/missing. The guide needs updating.
Posts.HTML:

Posts.EditableText: the documentation is sometimes not fully up-to-date, unfortuntely a lot of us are too busy/lazy -------------- see this thread: viewforum.php?f=18 and, specifically (I believe Pixie has created an updated 'equipment' library as he/she been helping ayonynn/neonayon), which I think is this link: viewtopic.php?f=18&t=6064 viewtopic.php?f=18&t=5976 (this probably has an equipment system in it too) (correct me Pixie if this is wrong) and here's Chase's 'wearables' (equipment) Library: viewtopic.php?f=18&t=2901
